name: Whispers of the Night
description:
Whispers of The Night game is a point and click game but the player can also use the arrow keys to move our ghost lady. Our theme is "It is not you, it's me!". In the game we have some puzzles to solve and a very good narrative. The player will use point and click for interactions.The aim of the game is to solve our murder by talking with other ghosts and solve some puzzles.
